summary: When a small research plane carrying a group of science students and their professor crash-lands in the middle of nowhere, the survivors go to a nearby farmhouse to look for help but soon find themselves besieged by giant mutant spiders.
cast: Rob Monkiewicz|Irene Joseph|David Bunce|Bevin McGraw|Alexxus Young|James Aspden|Dan Merriman|Fred La Torella|Christopher Thompson|Dan Mazur|Ben Kahn|Will Toto|James Robillard|Sean O'Brien|Scott Jensen|Jonathan Charles|Joshua Lutes
title: Arachnia
